p:
Importance value index (IVI) provides information about the ecological importance of a species in plant communities
25 . IVI was used to determine ecological value of medicinal plant in our study. Since species density, frequency and dominance comprised IVI are sensitive indicators to anthropogenic actives
26, 27 . Reaction of species to human exploitation can be revealed with comparing IVI with and without exploiting
28, 29 . Relative loss (RL) index was measured to assess ecological situation of medicinal plants under both nomadic and sedentary pastoral system using changes IVI.
